data.title: International Endeavors Plans Name Change to ModuLink
data.description:
International Endeavors ( (IDVV) ) has issued an update.

On October 26, 2025, International Endeavors Corporation announced its filing of an amendment to change its corporate name to ModuLink Inc. and increase its authorized common stock shares from 4 billion to 6 billion. This amendment is subject to review by the SEC and FINRA, with potential delays due to regulatory reviews and possible legal actions from stockholders. The company plans to maintain compliance with SEC disclosure requirements and will update shareholders as key regulatory steps are completed.

More about International Endeavors

International Endeavors Corporation, operating under the brand name ModuLink, is involved in property development using modular integrated construction technology. The company integrates proprietary atmospheric water generators and IoT-based property management systems to create sustainable and intelligent properties for various markets, including residential, commercial, industrial, and remote environments.

Current Market Cap: $2.38M

For a thorough assessment of IDVV stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Corcel PLC Adopts New Incentive Plans to Align Leadership and Shareholder Interests
data.description:
Corcel ( (GB:CRCL) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Corcel PLC has announced the adoption of a Founder Share Plan (FSP) and a Share Option Plan (SOP) aimed at recruiting, retaining, and incentivizing its directors and senior staff. These plans are designed to align the interests of the leadership team with shareholders by linking rewards to the creation of shareholder value. The FSP and SOP have been developed with independent expert advice and feedback from major shareholders, ensuring they align with market practices. The company is also considering establishing an employee benefit trust to support these plans and limit shareholder dilution.

Spark’s Take on GB:CRCL Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, GB:CRCL is a Neutral.

Corcel PLC’s stock score is primarily impacted by significant financial challenges, including zero revenue and negative cash flow, which weigh heavily on its overall performance. While technical indicators show neutral to positive momentum, and recent strategic progress in Angola and Brazil offers hope for future growth, the unfavorable valuation metrics underscore the need for sustained profitability improvements.

More about Corcel

Corcel PLC is an energy company focused on operations in Angola and Brazil. It is listed on the London AIM market under the ticker CRCL.

data.title: AMTD Digital Inc. Reports Massive Revenue Growth for First Half of 2025
data.description:
AMTD IDEA Group ( (AMTD) ) just unveiled an update.

AMTD Digital Inc. reported a significant 1,085.9% increase in revenue for the six months ending April 30, 2025, compared to the same period in 2024. This growth is attributed to the consolidation of The Generation Essentials Group (TGE) and expansion in its hospitality, media, and entertainment sectors. The company’s total assets amounted to $899.1 million, with net assets at $548.0 million. The integration of TGE has bolstered AMTD Digital’s strategic positioning in the market, demonstrating resilience and potential for future opportunities. This financial performance reflects the company’s commitment to delivering long-term value to shareholders and expanding its global footprint.

The most recent analyst rating on (AMTD) stock is a Hold with a $1.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on AMTD IDEA Group stock, see the AMTD Stock Forecast page.

However, the declining revenue and cash flow challenges, coupled with neutral technical indicators, suggest caution. The absence of earnings call and corporate events data limits further insights.

AMTD Digital Inc., a subsidiary of AMTD IDEA Group, is a comprehensive digital solutions platform headquartered in France. The company operates key business lines including digital media, content and marketing services, investments, as well as hospitality and VIP services.

data.title: Shanghai Realway Capital’s Subsidiary Enters Consulting Agreement with Xinhe Credit
data.description:
An update from Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. Class H ( (HK:1835) ) is now available.

Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. announced that its indirect subsidiary, Yuanhui Qichuang, has entered into a Consulting Management Services Framework Agreement with Xinhe Credit. This agreement involves Yuanhui Qichuang providing consulting management services for Xinhe Credit’s distressed personal loan assets, including strategy formulation, inventory checks, and legal consultations. The transaction is considered a continuing connected transaction under Hong Kong’s Listing Rules, requiring annual review and reporting but exempt from shareholder approval. The Board has approved the agreement, deeming it fair and in the company’s and shareholders’ best interests.

The most recent analyst rating on (HK:1835) stock is a Hold with a HK$2.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. Class H stock, see the HK:1835 Stock Forecast page.

More about Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. Class H

Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. operates in the financial services industry, focusing on asset management. The company is involved in providing consulting management services, particularly in the area of distressed assets and personal loans.

Average Trading Volume: 6,800

Technical Sentiment Signal: Hold

Current Market Cap: HK$309.7M

data.title: Eidesvik Offshore Secures Contract Extensions with Aker BP
data.description:
Eidesvik Offshore ASA ( (DE:E1V) ) has provided an announcement.

Eidesvik Offshore ASA has announced that Aker BP ASA has extended the contract for their supply vessel Viking Lady until February 2027, and the firm period for Viking Prince has been extended by approximately three months to February 2026. This extension reflects the strong collaboration between Eidesvik Offshore ASA and Aker BP ASA, potentially enhancing Eidesvik’s market position and ensuring continued operational stability.

data.title: Lobo Technologies Regains Nasdaq Compliance
data.description:
An announcement from Lobo EV Technologies Ltd. ( (LOBO) ) is now available.

Lobo EV Technologies Ltd., a company operating in the electric vehicle sector, recently received confirmation from Nasdaq that it has regained compliance with the minimum bid price requirement for continued listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market. This follows a notification in May 2025 that the company was not in compliance. As of October 30, 2025, the company’s Class A ordinary shares have maintained a closing bid price of $1.00 or greater for 10 consecutive business days, resolving the issue and ensuring its continued presence on the market.

The most recent analyst rating on (LOBO) stock is a Hold with a $1.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Lobo EV Technologies Ltd. stock, see the LOBO Stock Forecast page.

data.title: Perfect Moment Ltd. Extends Loan Maturity Date
data.description:
Perfect Moment Ltd. ( (PMNT) ) has issued an update.

On August 26, 2025, Max Gottschalk, Chairman of the Board of Perfect Moment Ltd., extended loans totaling $5,089,960 to the company to support its operations and product purchases. These loans were initially set with a maturity date of November 8, 2025, for a portion of the amount. On October 30, 2025, the company and Gottschalk amended and restated one of the promissory notes, extending its maturity date to March 9, 2026, which provides the company with additional time to manage its financial obligations.

The most recent analyst rating on (PMNT) stock is a Hold with a $0.50 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Perfect Moment Ltd. stock, see the PMNT Stock Forecast page.

data.description:

data.title: Argyle Resources Secures C$500,000 in First Tranche of LIFE Offering
data.description:
An announcement from Argyle Resources Corp. ( (TSE:ARGL) ) is now available.

Argyle Resources Corp. has successfully closed the first tranche of its LIFE Offering, raising C$500,000 through the sale of units priced at C$0.20 each. The proceeds are earmarked for legal, accounting, marketing, mineral exploration, and general working capital. This financial move positions Argyle to advance its exploration activities and strengthen its market presence in the mineral exploration industry.

More about Argyle Resources Corp.

Argyle Resources Corp. is a junior mineral exploration company focused on acquiring, exploring, staking, and evaluating natural resource properties in North America. The company holds a 100% interest in several projects in Québec, Canada, and has options for additional properties in Ontario and Nova Scotia. Argyle collaborates with the National Institute of Scientific Research for exploration programs on its silica projects.

Average Trading Volume: 69,734

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell
